name: Countless
description:
Blog posts | @CountlessGame | Press Kit

Start counting!


Are you quick enough?

Match as many pairs as you can in this fast-paced ability game.

  • Be fast: the faster you are, the more points you will get.
  • Train your memory and concentration by solving as many boards as you can.
  • Get coins to unlock shields and skins.
  • Challenge your friends to beat you on both online and local leaderboards.
  • Unlock challenging achievements.
  • 100% indie game :-)
